title: Noam Chomsky Destroys Modern Day Trump-Republican Party
description:
--Noam Chomsky is one of the most renowned and quoted intellectuals of our time and is the author of over 25 books, including "Chomsky for Activists (Universalizing Resistance)," and joins David to discuss geopolitics, Trump and Biden, the future of American politics, and much more. Get the book: https://amzn.to/3yQGRpP
